name: web-streams-polyfill
description: Web Streams, based on the WHATWG spec reference implementation

scripts.test: (cd spec/reference-implementation ; npm install && npm run test)
scripts.bundle: npm run de-assert && npm-run-all bundle:* && npm run re-assert
scripts.bundle:min: browserify -g uglifyify index.es6.js -i ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/utils.js -d -s default -t [ babelify --plugins babel-plugin-unassert uglifyify ] -i ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/utils.js -d | exorcist ./dist/polyfill.min.js.map > ./dist/polyfill.min.js
scripts.de-assert:catch: rsync -rIl spec/ spec-orig && grep -Evo '^.*rethrowAssertionErrorRejection.*$' ./spec-orig/reference-implementation/lib/helpers.js > ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/helpers.js && grep -Evo '^.*rethrowAssertionErrorRejection.*$' ./spec-orig/reference-implementation/lib/queue-with-sizes.js > ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/queue-with-sizes.js && grep -Evo '^.*rethrowAssertionErrorRejection.*$' ./spec-orig/reference-implementation/lib/readable-stream.js > ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/readable-stream.js && grep -Evo '^.*rethrowAssertionErrorRejection.*$' ./spec-orig/reference-implementation/lib/transform-stream.js > ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/transform-stream.js && grep -Evo '^.*rethrowAssertionErrorRejection.*$' ./spec-orig/reference-implementation/lib/writable-stream.js > ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/writable-stream.js
scripts.bar: mkdir spec-babel && mkdir ./spec-babel/reference-implementation/ && mkdir ./spec-babel/reference-implementation/lib/ && babel ./spec/reference-implementation/lib --out-dir ./spec-babel/reference-implementation/lib && rsync ./spec/ ./spec-orig && rm ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/* && grep -Evo '^(.*[Aa]ssert)' ./spec-babel/reference-implementation/lib/helpers.js > ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/helpers.js
scripts.de-assert:all: mkdir spec-babel && mkdir ./spec-babel/reference-implementation/ && mkdir ./spec-babel/reference-implementation/lib/ && babel ./spec/reference-implementation/lib --out-dir ./spec-babel/reference-implementation/lib && rsync ./spec/ ./spec-orig && grep -Evo '^(.*[Aa]ssert)' ./spec-babel/reference-implementation/lib/helpers.js > ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/helpers.js && grep -Evo '^(.*[Aa]ssert)' ./spec-babel/reference-implementation/lib/queue-with-sizes.js > ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/queue-with-sizes.js && grep -Evo '^(.*[Aa]ssert)' ./spec-babel/reference-implementation/lib/readable-stream.js > ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/readable-stream.js && grep -Evo '^(.*[Aa]ssert)' ./spec-babel/reference-implementation/lib/transform-stream.js > ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/transform-stream.js && grep -Evo '^(.*[Aa]ssert)' ./spec-babel/reference-implementation/lib/writable-stream.js > ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/writable-stream.js
scripts.re-assert: rm -rf spec-babel && rm -rf spec && mv spec-orig spec
scripts.readable:no-assert-all: npm run de-assert:all && browserify -g uglifyify ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/readable-stream.js -d -s default -t [ babelify uglifyify ] -i ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/utils.js -d | exorcist ./readable.min.js.map > ./readable.min.js && npm run re-assert && ls -lh
scripts.readable:no-assert: browserify -g uglifyify ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/readable-stream.js -d -s default -t [ babelify --plugins babel-plugin-unassert  uglifyify ] -i ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/utils.js -d | exorcist ./readable.min.js.map > ./readable.min.js && ls -lh
scripts.readable:assert: browserify -g uglifyify ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/readable-stream.js -d -s default -t [ babelify uglifyify ] -i assert -i ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/utils.js -d | exorcist ./readable.min.js.map > ./readable.min.js && ls -lh
scripts.build: rm -rf spec && git clone https://github.com/whatwg/streams.git && mv ./streams ./spec && cd spec && git checkout ba5cc069302db2e325815af7d2cd1e743e12773f && cd .. && npm run bundle
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf spec && git clone https://github.com/whatwg/streams.git && mv ./streams ./spec && cd spec && git checkout ba5cc069302db2e325815af7d2cd1e743e12773f && cd ..

author: Diwank Singh <diwank.singh@gmail.com>
